import {FaSignInAlt, FaSignOutAlt, FaUser} from 'react-icons/fa' import {Link, useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {logout, reset} from '../features/auth/authSlice' function Header() { const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const {user} = useSelector((user) => state.auth) const onLogout = () => { dispatch(logout()) dispatch(reset()) navigate('/') } return (
Support Desk
    {user ? (
    • ) : ( <>
  • Login
  • Register
    • )}
) } export default Header
